cause.description:
Solidere is dumping thousands of tons of toxicated garbage from the normandi junk place under the name of making better shores. anyway finding "cyclic hexa atomic sulfur" in the water is a very dangerous thing and everyone should scream to stop this crime.
1. sloidere must stop the normandi crime to our sea
cause.mission: Stop Solidere from poluting our sea
cause.name: Save Beirut's Sea
